Updated November     pm



Dele Alli was sexually abused at the age of six and began selling drugs when he was eight PERIOD

The 27yearold footballer has opened up about his troubled childhood and admitted his life finally changed for the better when he was  and got adopted by an  family PERIOD

Speaking to Gary Neville on his YouTube series The Overlap he said I mean I think there were a few incidents that could give you kind of a brief understanding PERIOD

At seven I started smoking eight I started dealing drugs PERIOD

Eleven I was hung off a bridge by a guy from the next estate a man PERIOD

If God created people it was them PERIOD They were amazing and theyve helped me a lot and that was another thing you know  when I started living with them it was hard for me to really open up to them because I felt within myself it was easy to get rid of me again PERIOD



Dele  who returned to Everton in April following a period out on loan to Turkish side Besiktas  also revealed he spent six weeks in rehab earlier this year to seek help for an addiction to sleeping pills and excessive drinking PERIOD

He said I was in a bad place mentally PERIOD I decided to go to a modern rehab facility that deals with addiction and mental health and trauma PERIOD I felt it was time for me PERIOD

You cant be told to go there you have to make the decision yourself PERIOD

I was in a bad cycle PERIOD I was relying on things that were doing me harm PERIOD I was waking up every day winning the fight going into training every day smiling  willing to show I was happy PERIOD

Inside I was losing the battle and it was time to change PERIOD When I was told I needed surgery I could feel the feelings I had when the cycle began PERIOD

So I went there for six weeks PERIOD Everton were amazing and supported I will be grateful to them for ever PERIOD For them to be so honest and understanding I couldnt ask for anything more during a time I was making the biggest decision of my life  doing something I was scared to do PERIOD Im happy Ive done it. originally published on celebretainment.com part of the BLOX Digital Content Exchange PERIOD

Never miss our photos stories and videos PERIOD
title: Abused at six, smoking at seven, selling drugs at eight: Dele Alli opens up on traumatic childhood | Entertainment | msuexponent.com
name: Montana State University Bozeman
